game.description: Complete tasks and defeat enemies to save the kingdom from destruction.
game.objective: Retrieve the magical artifact and bring it to the quest giver.
game.reward: A legendary sword and a bag of gold coins.

tasks.description: Collect 10 rare herbs from the enchanted forest.
tasks.objective: Find and gather the rare herbs.

tasks.description: Defeat the mighty dragon guarding the treasure.
tasks.objective: Slay the dragon and retrieve the magical artifact.

tasks.description: Deliver the magical artifact to the kingdom's wizard.
tasks.objective: Hand over the magical artifact to the wizard.

game.title: The Quest for the Magical Artifact
